message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to start at $1200000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you're providing. Based on my budget and needs, I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is the best price I can offer at this time.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the market value, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I've taken your latest offer into consideration, and I'm willing to meet you at $1075000. This is my final concession, and I believe it's a fair price for the product's value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After considering your proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $1050000 for the product.

I'm not quite ready to meet at $1050000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'm counteroffering at $1080000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $1065000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm counteroffering at $1090000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's the best value for the product.
I appreciate your offers, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1070000 for the product.
